product_name: Omega Pacific 1/2" Standard D Screw-Lok Locking Carabiner - Steel
long_description: The Omega Pacific(R) steel locking carabiner is designed for rescue work, caving and other heavy-duty applications. Large D-shape for easy handling and huge gate opening for managing multiple ropes. Screw-Lok gate prevents accidental opening of gate during usage. Rated strength of 72kN makes this is one of the strongest carabiners available. Heat-treated and half-load tested at over 8,000 pounds of force, this 0.5-inch steel carabiner is built to last.
short_description: The Omega Pacific(R) steel locking carabiner is designed for rescue work, caving and other heavy-duty applications.
